sentences.en: A small turret or spire on a roof or buttress.
sentences.cn: 有以百叶窗遮蔽的钟塔和尖顶的教堂;装了绿色百叶窗的小别墅.

sentences.en: And GAOTT said , Let there be turret; and there was turret.
sentences.cn: 政委命令: “要有炮塔, ”炮塔就出现.

sentences.en: Arm is the main working parts of ladle turret.
sentences.cn: 升降支臂是钢包回转台的主要工作部件.

sentences.en: At length she gained the end of the ascent and stood upon the turret top.
sentences.cn: 最后她到达了梯子尽头,站在塔顶上面了.

sentences.en: CNC turret so that the majority of users in a certain visibility.
sentences.cn: 使数控刀架在广大用户中有一定的知名度.

sentences.en: Drop a grenade when a turret opens, but beware of bullets being fired at you.
sentences.cn: 当角楼打开的时候，扔出手榴弹，一定要注意躲避射向你的子弹。

sentences.en: I mount the last flight , turret, in a sweat and terror.
sentences.cn: 我大汗淋漓、惊慌失措地爬上最后一段楼梯, 即塔楼.

sentences.en: Rapid NC turret punch press was used as advanced press process equipment.
sentences.cn: 高速数控转塔冲床(高速数控冲模回转头压力机)是应用于高端压力加工的设备.

sentences.en: Several lenses mounted on a turret arrangement permit quick lens changes.
sentences.cn: 几个不同的镜头装在透镜旋转台上,这样可以很快改换镜头.

sentences.en: The gun on the turret could be swivelled once in a minute.
sentences.cn: 炮塔的火炮可在一分钟内旋转一周.

sentences.en: The machine - guns were up on the turret blazing away like anything but it wasn't any use!
sentences.cn: 机关枪 就架在宏昌的更楼边——卜卜卜,真可怕!然而济得什么事 呀 !

sentences.en: The soldier scaled the wall of the fortress by turret.
sentences.cn: 士兵通过塔车攀登上了要塞的城墙.

sentences.en: The turret and hull are of all - welded steel armour construction.
sentences.cn: 炮塔和车体是全焊接钢甲制造.

sentences.en: This ancient turret has attracted many visitors.
sentences.cn: 这座古老的塔楼吸引了很多游客。

sentences.en: Treatment methods normally through elevation turret tool holder with a knife.
sentences.cn: 办理办法凡是通功抬矮刀架,即在刀架不上面增一块刀垫.

sentences.en: Turret speed, filling depth of material and tablet thickness are adjustable.
sentences.cn: 转盘速度, 物料的充填深度、压片厚度均可调节.
